comment._content:
Hi,
Thanks for your comment. Three Cliffs Bay is on the Gower coast in South Wales and has a very beautiful coastline and golden sands although these women don't look as though they were dressed for the beach.

comment.author: 58272421@N00
comment._content: wow amazing, i will certainly think about these ladies standing there when next im at three cliffs!
